endpoints.description: Queries the patient table for guarantors that have balances.

clinicNum.description: The clinic number to filter the query. Optional to reduce execution time.

guarantor.description: The patient number of the guarantor.

body.query: SELECT patnum, estbalance, bal_0_30, bal_31_60, bal_61_90, balover90, insest, baltotal FROM patient WHERE patnum=guarantor AND (estbalance>0 OR bal_0_30>0 OR bal_31_60>0 OR bal_61_90>0 OR balover90>0 OR insest>0 OR baltotal>0)

business_logic.title: Definition Creation Rules
